name: Fire Fighting Robot Transform
description:
Be a robot fire fighter war hero in futuristic city battle game!

Fire fighter robot transform hero is 3d fighting game.Flying fire truck robot hero is invasion robot simulation, with transforming horse mech robot game. With all this heavy armor, be hero of robot grand war & drive futuristic heavy supercar or vehicle and do not hot city buildings. 

This real futuristic robot transform firefighter truck 3D game is equipped with shooting games skills and best fighting simulator.
